about_the_game:
Yes you heard it here first, folks. HopDodge is now a free demo! I hope that many people will enjoy playing this version and telling me what they think about the game in general.

This application proximation of a platformer with automation is making a statement across the nation!
Hop, skip, jump and dodge through 6(?) levels!
Create your own levels using roughly half of the objects available in the full game!

Play for free and decide if this weird world is worth your valuable time (and money).
detailed_description:
Yes you heard it here first, folks. HopDodge is now a free demo! I hope that many people will enjoy playing this version and telling me what they think about the game in general.

This application proximation of a platformer with automation is making a statement across the nation!

Play for free and decide if this weird world is worth your valuable time (and money).
name: HopDodge Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: HopDodge Demo brings classic grid and 3D platforming to the end user for no money down! So there's literally no reason not to just download it and play it right now!
